mapper.select: select * from kjs_icbc_zx where 1=1 and bc_status=#{bc_status}
mapper.insert:
insert into kjs_icbc_zx( id, c_name, c_cardno, c_del, sex, icbc_ajbank_id, dk_produce_id, yw_id, po_name, po_cardno, po_phoneno, g_name1, g_cardno1, g_phoneno1, g_name2, g_cardno2, g_phoneno2, img_1, img_2, img_3, img_4, img_1s, bc_status, zx_result, add_dt, up_dt, result_dt, md_add, md_edit, api_add, api_edit, sh_edit, mid_add, mid_edit, dt_add, dt_edit, dt_sub, dt_fin, gems_code, query_type
)values( #{id}, #{c_name}, #{c_cardno}, #{c_del}, #{sex}, #{icbc_ajbank_id}, #{dk_produce_id}, #{yw_id}, #{po_name}, #{po_cardno}, #{po_phoneno}, #{g_name1}, #{g_cardno1}, #{g_phoneno1}, #{g_name2}, #{g_cardno2}, #{g_phoneno2}, #{img_1}, #{img_2}, #{img_3}, #{img_4}, #{img_1s}, #{bc_status}, #{zx_result}, #{add_dt}, #{up_dt}, #{result_dt}, #{md_add}, #{md_edit}, #{api_add}, #{api_edit}, #{sh_edit}, #{mid_add}, #{mid_edit}, #{dt_add}, #{dt_edit}, #{dt_sub}, #{dt_fin}, #{gems_code}, #{query_type} )
